templates.title: Cybersecurity Policy Documentation
templates.description: Formal cybersecurity policy document approved by management covering roles, responsibilities, and procedures
templates.recommendation: Develop and approve a comprehensive cybersecurity policy that establishes the foundation for your cybersecurity program. Should be reviewed annually.

templates.title: Incident Response Plan
templates.description: Documented incident response procedures with defined roles, escalation paths, and communication protocols
templates.recommendation: Maintain a comprehensive incident response plan and test it quarterly. Include contact information, escalation procedures, and recovery steps.

templates.title: Backup Strategy Implementation
templates.description: Documented backup and recovery procedures with regular testing of restore capabilities
templates.recommendation: Implement 3-2-1 backup strategy (3 copies, 2 different media, 1 offsite). Test restoration procedures monthly.

templates.title: Multi-Factor Authentication for Privileged Accounts
templates.description: MFA enabled for all administrator and privileged user accounts across all systems
templates.recommendation: Enable MFA for all admin accounts immediately. Use hardware tokens or authenticator apps rather than SMS when possible.

templates.title: Annual Security Awareness Training
templates.description: All employees receive annual cybersecurity awareness training with completion tracking
templates.recommendation: Provide mandatory annual cybersecurity training for all employees. Include phishing simulation exercises.

templates.title: Quarterly Access Rights Review
templates.description: Regular review of user access rights and permissions to ensure principle of least privilege
templates.recommendation: Conduct quarterly reviews of all user access. Remove unnecessary permissions and deactivate unused accounts.

templates.title: Annual Risk Assessment
templates.description: Comprehensive cybersecurity risk assessment documenting threats, vulnerabilities, and mitigation strategies
templates.recommendation: Conduct formal risk assessments annually. Document findings and track remediation efforts.

templates.title: Security Log Retention Policy
templates.description: Security logs retained for minimum 12 months with centralized collection and monitoring
templates.recommendation: Implement centralized logging with minimum 12-month retention. Monitor logs for security events.

templates.title: Email Security Controls (SPF/DKIM/DMARC)
templates.description: Email authentication protocols properly configured to prevent spoofing and phishing
templates.recommendation: Configure SPF, DKIM, and DMARC records. Start with monitoring mode, then enforce.

templates.title: External Security Audit
templates.description: Independent security assessment conducted within the last 3 years
templates.recommendation: Schedule external security audits every 2-3 years for objective validation of security controls.

templates.title: Regular Vulnerability Scanning
templates.description: Automated vulnerability scanning performed regularly on network assets
templates.recommendation: Schedule weekly vulnerability scans. Remediate critical findings within 72 hours, high within 30 days.

templates.title: SSL/TLS Certificate Validation
templates.description: Valid SSL/TLS certificates with proper configuration and current expiration dates
templates.recommendation: Use certificates from trusted CAs. Monitor expiration dates and renew 30 days before expiry.

templates.title: HTTP Security Headers Implementation
templates.description: Proper implementation of HTTP security headers (HSTS, CSP, X-Frame-Options, etc.)
templates.recommendation: Implement security headers: HSTS, CSP, X-Frame-Options, X-Content-Type-Options, Referrer-Policy.

templates.title: Open Ports Security Review
templates.description: Regular review of open ports and services to ensure only necessary services are exposed
templates.recommendation: Review open ports monthly. Close unnecessary services and restrict access where possible.

templates.title: Service Banner Security Analysis
templates.description: Analysis of service banners to identify software versions and potential vulnerabilities
templates.recommendation: Configure services to minimize information disclosure in banners. Update software regularly.

templates.title: Web Application Identification
templates.description: Identification and cataloging of web applications for security assessment
templates.recommendation: Maintain inventory of all web applications. Ensure they are included in security testing.

templates.title: DNS Security Configuration
templates.description: DNS security measures including DNSSEC and proper record configuration
templates.recommendation: Implement DNSSEC where possible. Regularly audit DNS records for unauthorized changes.

templates.title: Subdomain Security Assessment
templates.description: Regular assessment of subdomains for security misconfigurations and unauthorized services
templates.recommendation: Regularly enumerate subdomains to identify shadow IT and unauthorized services.

templates.title: IP Address Geolocation Review
templates.description: Review of IP address geolocation for compliance and security considerations
templates.recommendation: Ensure IP addresses are in approved geographic regions for regulatory compliance.

templates.title: Service Authentication Requirements
templates.description: Verification that services require proper authentication and authorization
templates.recommendation: Ensure all services require authentication. Implement strong password policies and consider MFA.

templates.title: Data Encryption in Transit and at Rest
templates.description: Verification that sensitive data is encrypted both in transit and at rest
templates.recommendation: Implement encryption for all sensitive data. Use TLS 1.2+ for transit, AES-256 for rest.

templates.title: Service Software Patching
templates.description: Regular patching and updates of service software to address security vulnerabilities
templates.recommendation: Implement automated patching where possible. Test patches in staging before production deployment.

templates.title: Network Segmentation Implementation
templates.description: Proper network segmentation to limit blast radius of potential security incidents
templates.recommendation: Segment networks based on risk levels. Implement VLANs and firewalls between segments.

templates.title: Security Monitoring and Alerting
templates.description: Continuous monitoring of assets with automated alerting for security events
templates.recommendation: Implement SIEM or equivalent monitoring. Configure alerts for suspicious activities.
